hw_api_object->count

(PHP 4, PHP 5 < 5.2.0, PECL hwapi CVS)

hw_api_object->count — Returns number of attributes

Description

hw_api_object
int count ( array $parameter )

Returns the number of attributes.

Parameters

parameter

Return Values

Returns the number as an integer.
